verses.verse: Therefore, <S%G5620><s%> my brothers <S%G80><s%>dearly beloved <S%G27><s%> and longed <S%G1973><s%> for, my joy <S%G5479><s%> and crown, <S%G4735><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> stand <S%G4739><s%> fast in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my dearly beloved. <S%G27><s%>
I beseech <S%G3870><s%> Euodias, <S%G2136><s%> and beseech <S%G3870><s%> Syntyche, <S%G4941><s%> that they be of the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And I entreat <S%G2065><s%> you also, <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G1103><s%> yoke fellow, <S%G4805><s%> help <S%G4815><s%> those <S%G846><s%> women which <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G4866><s%> with me in the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> with Clement <S%G2815><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and with other <S%G3062><s%> my fellow laborers, <S%G4904><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are in the book <S%G976><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> always: <S%G104><s%> and again <S%G3825><s%> I say, <S%G2046><s%> Rejoice. <S%G5463><s%>
Let your <S%G5216><s%> moderation <S%G1933><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is at <S%G1451><s%> hand. <S%G1451><s%>

Be careful <S%G3309><s%> for nothing; <S%G3367><s%> but in every <S%G3956><s%> thing by prayer <S%G4335><s%> and supplication <S%G1162><s%> with thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> let your <S%G5216><s%> requests <S%G155><s%> be made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the peace <S%G1515><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> passes <S%G5242><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> understanding, <S%G3563><s%> shall keep <S%G5432><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> and minds <S%G3540><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are true, <S%G227><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are honest, <S%G4586><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are just, <S%G1342><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are pure, <S%G53><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are lovely, <S%G4375><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> things are of good <S%G2163><s%> report; <S%G2163><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G1536><s%> virtue, <S%G703><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G1536><s%> praise, <S%G1868><s%> think <S%G3049><s%> on these <S%G5023><s%> things.

Those <S%G5023><s%> things, which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> learned, <S%G3129><s%> and received, <S%G3880><s%> and heard, <S%G191><s%> and seen <S%G1492><s%> in me, do: <S%G4238><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be with you.

But I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> greatly, <S%G3171><s%> that now <S%G2236><s%> at <S%G4218><s%> the last <S%G4218><s%> your <S%G3588><s%> care <S%G5426><s%> of me has flourished <S%G330><s%> again; <S%G330><s%> wherein <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3757><s%> you were also <S%G2532><s%> careful, <S%G5426><s%> but you lacked <S%G170><s%> opportunity. <S%G170><s%>

Not that I speak <S%G3004><s%> in respect <S%G2596><s%> of want: <S%G5304><s%> for I have learned, <S%G3129><s%> in whatever <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3739><s%> state I am, <S%G1510><s%> therewith to be content. <S%G842><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> how to be abased, <S%G5013><s%> and I know <S%G1492><s%> how to abound: <S%G4052><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> things I am instructed <S%G3453><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to be full <S%G5526><s%> and to be hungry, <S%G3983><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> and to suffer <S%G5302><s%> need.
I can <S%G2480><s%> do <S%G2480><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things through <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> strengthens <S%G1743><s%> me.
Notwithstanding <S%G4133><s%> you have well <S%G2573><s%> done, <S%G4160><s%> that you did communicate <S%G4790><s%> with my affliction. <S%G2347><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> you Philippians <S%G5374><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> that in the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I departed <S%G1831><s%> from Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> communicated <S%G2841><s%> with me as concerning <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3056><s%> giving <S%G1394><s%> and receiving, <S%G3028><s%> but you only. <S%G3441><s%>
For even <S%G2532><s%> in Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> you sent <S%G3992><s%> once <S%G530><s%> and again <S%G1364><s%> to my necessity. <S%G5532><s%>
Not because <S%G3754><s%> I desire <S%G1934><s%> a gift: <S%G1390><s%> but I desire <S%G1934><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> that may abound <S%G4121><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> account. <S%G3056><s%>

But I have <S%G568><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and abound: <S%G4052><s%> I am full, <S%G4137><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> of Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> the things which were sent from you, an odor <S%G3744><s%> of a sweet <S%G2175><s%> smell, <S%G2175><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> acceptable, <S%G1184><s%> well pleasing <S%G2101><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

But my God <S%G2316><s%> shall supply <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his riches <S%G4149><s%> in glory <S%G1391><s%> by Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and our Father <S%G3962><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> saint <S%G40><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> The brothers <S%G80><s%> which are with me greet <S%G782><s%> you.
All <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you, chiefly <S%G3122><s%> they that are of Caesar's <S%G2541><s%> household. <S%G3614><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To the Philippians written from Rome, by Epaphroditus.
